definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
second (unit of time)/arc second (angular measurement unit)/(coll.) instantly

sentences.english: Today, they're angling for a one-microsecond edge.
sentences.chinese: 如今，他们连一微秒都要想方设法赢得。

sentences.english: This trick can save you microseconds or fractions of seconds with every page you open.
sentences.chinese: 这个技巧可以节省你的每打开网页您微秒或分数秒。

sentences.english: This system is so designed as to make a two-circuit structure with a cyclic time of 208 millimicroseconds.
sentences.chinese: 该系统设计成循环时间为208毫微秒的双总线结构。

sentences.english: Design and fix a us -grade adjustable pulsed power supply controlled by an AT89C51 single chip.
sentences.chinese: 设计并实际制作了单片机控制的微秒级可调脉冲电源。

sentences.english: Values for results are in microseconds.
These underlying services provide, at best, microsecond granularity.
sentences.chinese: 这些底层服务最多提供微秒粒度。

sentences.english: A microsecond is a millionth of a second.
It offers microsecond speed in database transactions.
sentences.chinese: 它提供微秒级的数据库事务处理速度。

sentences.english: UNH! HEY, I WASN'T WORRIED FOR A MICROSECOND.
sentences.chinese: 我连一微秒都没害怕过。

sentences.english: Counts the number of nanosecond boundaries between two nullable dates.
sentences.chinese: 对两个指定日期之间的毫微秒边界数进行计数。

sentences.english: If I'm running a linear algorithm, it'll take one microsecond to complete.
sentences.chinese: 算法会在1微秒内完成，如果是一个平方级的方法。

sentences.english: A time-resolved spectrograph with the electronic control circuit is described.
sentences.chinese: 制作了一台电子控制的微秒级光谱时间分解器。

sentences.english: The system cycle time is designed with 208x10~(-9) sec two-bus structure.
sentences.chinese: 该系统设计成循环时间为208毫微秒的双总线结构。

definition: nanosecond, ns, 10^-9 s (PRC)/Taiwan equivalent: 奈秒[nai4 miao3]
megabyte (2^20 or approximately a million bytes)
electron volt (unit of energy used in particle physics, approximately 10^-19 Joules)
micron (one thousandth of a millimeter or 10^-6 meter)
